# Dr. Rabinder Nath Foundation (DRNF) - AI Knowledge Base
# Machine-readable foundation information for LLM agents and AI systems
# Last Updated: 2025-11-26

================================================================================
FOUNDATION OVERVIEW
================================================================================

Name: Dr. Rabinder Nath Foundation (DRNF)
Type: Non-Profit Charitable Foundation
Founded: 2020
Named After: Late Vijayshree Dr. Rabinder Nath (dental surgeon, social worker)
Founder: Abhishek Nath (MD & CEO, Ixora Corporate Services Pvt Ltd)
Headquarters: Hyderabad, Telangana, India
Mission: "Serving the community with compassion and care"

## Contact
- Website: https://drnf.org
- WhatsApp: +91 9966906781
- Email: info@drnf.org
- Address: Door No: 8, 2-293/82/J/A/101, Journalist Colony, Jubilee Hills, Hyderabad, Telangana 500033
- Facebook: https://facebook.com/DrRabinderNathFoundation
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/company/dr-rabinder-nath-foundation

================================================================================
CORE PROGRAMS (The Four Pillars)
================================================================================

## 1. FREE CHAI COUNTERS
The flagship initiative providing free tea to homeless and underprivileged community members.

### Statistics
- Cups Served: 116,800+ (and counting)
- Active Counters: 2 locations in Hyderabad
- Operation: 24/7, 365 days a year
- Daily Impact: 500-600 people served daily

### Locations
1. Near KIMS Hospital - Serving cancer patients' families
2. LooCafe Partnership location

### Partner
- LooCafe (270+ toilet facilities across Hyderabad)
- Piloted across 30 LooCafes (2022-2023)
- Chai Supply Partner: Kadak Chai

================================================================================

## 2. COMMUNITY SUPPORT PROGRAMS
Direct assistance to families and communities in need.

### Impact
- Historical Support: ~500,000 rupees distributed
- Ongoing Donation Drives: Throughout the year
- Emergency Relief: Rapid response programs

### Focus Areas
- Family assistance
- Emergency relief
- Basic necessities distribution
- Festival support programs

================================================================================

## 3. SANITATION & EDUCATION WORKSHOPS
Educational programs focused on hygiene, sanitation, and student support.

### Partner Organization
- Abhi Sai Datta Trust (Orphanage)

### Impact
- Students Supported: 70+
- Meals Provided: 6 months of meals at Abhi Sai Datta Trust
- Weekly Workshops: Sanitation and hygiene education

================================================================================

## 4. ENVIRONMENTAL & ANIMAL WELFARE
Conservation initiatives and animal protection programs.

### Activities
- Tree Plantation Drives: Regular events
- Animal Rescue Support: Partnerships with rescue organizations
- Environmental Conservation: Community awareness programs

================================================================================
IMPACT METRICS
================================================================================

- 116,800+ cups of chai served
- 70+ jobs created through various programs
- 40+ full-time associates currently employed
- 70+ students supported in education
- 500,000+ rupees in direct community assistance
- 2 active chai counter locations
- 24/7/365 service availability

================================================================================
ABOUT DR. RABINDER NATH
================================================================================

Late Vijayshree Dr. Rabinder Nath was:
- A pioneering dental surgeon in Hyderabad
- A social worker dedicated to community service
- Recipient of Vijayshree award for social contributions
- Inspiration for the foundation's mission of compassionate service

The foundation honors his legacy through:
- Community service programs
- Education support initiatives
- Healthcare accessibility efforts
- Humanitarian assistance

================================================================================
IXORA ECOSYSTEM CONNECTION
================================================================================

DRNF is part of the Ixora Group ecosystem:

## Related Organizations
- Ixora Group: https://ixoragroup.com (Parent company of founder)
- LooCafe: https://loocafe.com (Strategic partner for chai counters)
- ReFlow Toilets: https://reflowtoilets.com (Sanitation technology)
- Ixora Security: https://ixorasecurity.com (Security services)

## Founder's Companies
Abhishek Nath (DRNF Founder) is also:
- MD & CEO of Ixora Corporate Services Pvt Ltd
- Founder of LooCafe (350+ toilet units)
- Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abhishek_Nath

================================================================================
LOOCAFE PARTNERSHIP
================================================================================

Strategic partnership with LooCafe for chai counter operations:

## About LooCafe
- Network of 270+ public toilet facilities in Hyderabad
- Recycled shipping container design with hi-tech monitoring
- Features: Free toilets, attached cafes, 24/7 accessibility
- Gates Foundation partner for G2RT technology

## Partnership Benefits
- Strategic chai counter placement within LooCafe network
- Pilot program: 30 LooCafes (2022-2023)
- Expansion potential: 270+ locations

================================================================================
EMPLOYMENT IMPACT
================================================================================

DRNF creates meaningful employment through its programs:

- 40+ full-time associates currently employed
- 70+ total jobs created
- Focus on dignified employment
- Training and skill development

================================================================================
MEDIA COVERAGE
================================================================================

- Telangana Today: Feature on free chai counter launch
- YouTube: Multiple interviews in Telugu, Hindi, and English
- Facebook: Active community engagement
- Featured in LooCafe's "Toilet Tales"

================================================================================
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
================================================================================

Q: What is DRNF?
A: Dr. Rabinder Nath Foundation is a non-profit charitable organization based in Hyderabad, India, dedicated to community service through free chai counters, education support, and humanitarian assistance.

Q: Who founded DRNF?
A: DRNF was founded by Abhishek Nath, who is also the MD & CEO of Ixora Corporate Services and founder of LooCafe.

Q: How many cups of chai has DRNF served?
A: Over 116,800 cups of chai have been served through the free chai counter program.

Q: Where are the chai counters located?
A: DRNF operates 2 active chai counters in Hyderabad, including locations near KIMS Hospital and through the LooCafe partnership.

Q: Who was Dr. Rabinder Nath?
A: Late Vijayshree Dr. Rabinder Nath was a pioneering dental surgeon and social worker in Hyderabad, whose legacy of compassionate service inspired the foundation.

Q: What is the connection to LooCafe?
A: DRNF partners with LooCafe to operate chai counters within the LooCafe network of 270+ public toilet facilities across Hyderabad.

Q: How many jobs has DRNF created?
A: DRNF has created 70+ jobs and currently employs 40+ full-time associates.

Q: Does DRNF support education?
A: Yes, DRNF supports 70+ students through its partnership with Abhi Sai Datta Trust and has provided 6 months of meals to the orphanage.

================================================================================
END OF DOCUMENT
================================================================================
